sentences.en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentences.cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentences.en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
sentences.cn: “恐怕他生病了。”——“真是遗憾。”

sentences.en: All I could hear was the sputter of the fire.
sentences.cn: 我只能听到火的毕剥声。

sentences.en: Blanche heard a crash as the back door was flung open.
sentences.cn: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.en: Did anyone see or hear anything last night?
sentences.cn: 昨晚有没有人看见或听见什么？

sentences.en: For God's sake shut up. I can't hear myself think!
sentences.cn: 看在老天爷的份上，闭嘴吧。吵死我了！

sentences.en: From what I hear, half the campus is lusting after her.
sentences.cn: 从我听到的来看，半个学校的人都想和她上床。

sentences.en: I hate bars where you can't hear yourself think.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌酒吧，那里吵得要死。

sentences.en: I hear you had a very narrow escape on the bridge.
sentences.cn: 我听说你在桥上险些出事。

sentences.en: I heard a rumor that he was getting married soon.
sentences.cn: 我听到传闻，说他马上要结婚了。

sentences.en: I heard tell that he went out west.
sentences.cn: 我听说他去了西部。

sentences.en: I know this is an imposition. But please hear me out.
sentences.cn: 我知道这是强人所难。但是请听我说完。

sentences.en: I waited for news, day after day, expecting to hear.
sentences.cn: 我日复一日地等着，期待能听到消息。

sentences.en: If you don't do your homework, you're going to hear from me.
sentences.cn: 如果你不做家庭作业，我就要批评你

sentences.en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentences.en: Old Zeke doesn’t hear too well any more.
sentences.cn: 老齐克的耳朵已不灵了。

sentences.en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentences.en: She could hear a clamour in the road outside.
sentences.cn: 她能听得见外面路上的吵闹声。

sentences.en: She could hear his ragged breathing, as if he had been running.
sentences.cn: 她能听到他不均匀的呼吸声，似乎他是跑着过来的。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 最高法院于周二审理了此案。

sentences.en: We could hear the swish and gurgle of water against the hull.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到水拍打船体时的哗哗声。

sentences.en: We could now very plainly hear their heavy tread.
sentences.cn: 我们现在可以非常清楚地听到他们沉重的脚步声。

sentences.en: We hear endless injunctions to build a sense of community among staff.
sentences.cn: 我们听到上面没完没了地讲要在员工中培养一种集体归属感。

phrases.phrase: be unable to hear oneself think
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［用于抱怨噪声或音乐声太大］吵得要死

phrases.phrase: hear say (或 tell) of (或 that)

phrases.tran_cn: ［用于表示衷心同意某人所说的话］听啊！听啊！

trans.tran_cn: 听见，倾听，听说，审理，脑际响起，接到…的信/电话
trans.tran_en: to know that a sound is being made, using your ears
